parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.36
</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> DLC
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns appID of the DLC the object belongs to or [[nil]] if object is vanilla.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getObjectDLC''' obj

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  obj: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] (or [[Nothing]] if vanilla item)

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_appID = [[getObjectDLC]] [[cursorTarget]];
[[if]] (![[isNil]] "_appID") [[then]] {
	[[hint]] [[format]] ["This object belongs to DLC with id: %1", _appID];
} [[else]] {
	[[hint]] "This object is vanilla";
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_akm = [[createSimpleObject]] ["A3\Weapons_F_Exp\Rifles\AKM\AKM_F.p3d",[[getPosASL]] [[player]]];
[[getObjectDLC]] _akm;	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>395180</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getDLCs]], [[getPersonUsedDLCs]], [[getMissionDLCs]], [[getDLCAssetsUsageByName]], [[getDLCAssetsUsage]], [[getAssetDLCInfo]]
</value></part></template></root>
